reports.title: Total yearly vaccinations per PT (Live)
reports.query: https://streaming.phac.paradire.phac-aspc.alpha.canada.ca

reports.title: Initiate stream
reports.query:
MERGE (h:FAR_5_HELPER)
  SET h.request_id = apoc.create.uuid()
WITH h
  CREATE (n:FAR_5)
    SET
      n.request_id = h.request_id,
      n.pt_list = "AB,BC,MB,NB,NL,NT,NS,NU,ON,PE,QC,SK,YT",
      n.timestamp = apoc.date.currentTimestamp(),
      n.doc = "All PTs: Vaccination record streams."
RETURN n.request_id
RETURN true;
reports.title: Start date

reports.query: RETURN true;
reports.title: CVXs

reports.query:
MATCH (h:FAR_1_HELPER)
WITH h
  MATCH (n:FAS_1 {request_id: h.request_id_1})
WITH DISTINCT(n.patient_zip) AS zip, n.status_percent AS status_percent, n.patient_status AS patient_status
  WHERE NOT("0123456789" CONTAINS SUBSTRING(zip, 0, 1))
RETURN zip, status_percent, patient_status ORDER BY zip LIMIT 90
reports.title: Percentage of vaccinated population per zip code for the Period above (in first 30 zip codes by alphabetical order)

reports.query: RETURN true;
reports.title: PTs

reports.query:
MERGE (h:FAR_1_HELPER)
  SET 
    h.request_id_1 = apoc.create.uuid(),
    h.request_id_2 = apoc.create.uuid(),
    h.request_id_3 = apoc.create.uuid(),
    h.request_id_4 = apoc.create.uuid()
WITH h
  CREATE (n1:FAR_1)
    SET
      n1.request_id = h.request_id_1,
      n1.covid_cvx_list = $neodash_far_1_covid_cvx_list,
      n1.start_date = TOSTRING($neodash_far_1_start_date),
      n1.end_date = TOSTRING($neodash_far_1_start_date + DURATION({months: 3})),
      n1.pt_list = $neodash_pt_list,
      n1.timestamp = apoc.date.currentTimestamp(),
      n1.doc = "All PTs: COVID-19 monovalent Moderna adult (12+ yrs) vaccine, 1st/2nd dosage."
  CREATE (n2:FAR_1)
    SET
      n2.request_id = h.request_id_2,
      n2.covid_cvx_list = $neodash_far_1_covid_cvx_list,
      n2.start_date = TOSTRING($neodash_far_1_start_date),
      n2.end_date = TOSTRING($neodash_far_1_start_date + DURATION({months: 6})),
      n2.pt_list = $neodash_pt_list,
      n2.timestamp = apoc.date.currentTimestamp(),
      n2.doc = "All PTs: COVID-19 monovalent Moderna adult (12+ yrs) vaccine, 1st/2nd dosage."
  CREATE (n3:FAR_1)
    SET
      n3.request_id = h.request_id_3,
      n3.covid_cvx_list = $neodash_far_1_covid_cvx_list,
      n3.start_date = TOSTRING($neodash_far_1_start_date),
      n3.end_date = TOSTRING($neodash_far_1_start_date + DURATION({months: 9})),
      n3.pt_list = $neodash_pt_list,
      n3.timestamp = apoc.date.currentTimestamp(),
      n3.doc = "All PTs: COVID-19 monovalent Moderna adult (12+ yrs) vaccine, 1st/2nd dosage."
  CREATE (n4:FAR_1)
    SET
      n4.request_id = h.request_id_4,
      n4.covid_cvx_list = $neodash_far_1_covid_cvx_list,
      n4.start_date = TOSTRING($neodash_far_1_start_date),
      n4.end_date = TOSTRING($neodash_far_1_start_date + DURATION({months: 12})),
      n4.pt_list = $neodash_pt_list,
      n4.timestamp = apoc.date.currentTimestamp(),
      n4.doc = "All PTs: COVID-19 monovalent Moderna adult (12+ yrs) vaccine, 1st/2nd dosage."
RETURN TOSTRING($neodash_far_1_start_date) AS start, TOSTRING($neodash_far_1_start_date + DURATION({months: 12})) AS end;
reports.title: Send query to PTs

reports.query: RETURN true;
reports.title: End date

RETURN zip, status_percent, patient_status ORDER BY zip LIMIT 90

reports.query:
WITH apoc.convert.toJson(apoc.map.fromPairs([["03", 6], ["08", 6], ["20", 18], ["21", 12], ["49", 18], ["83", 18], ["114", 2], ["115", 48], ["119", 4], ["133", 4]])) AS cvx_maps
WITH apoc.map.sortedProperties(apoc.convert.fromJsonMap(cvx_maps)) AS sortedList
  UNWIND sortedList AS sorted
RETURN sorted[0] AS CVX, sorted[1] AS months
reports.title: Vaccination schedule

reports.query:
MERGE (h:FAR_2_HELPER)
  SET h.request_id = apoc.create.uuid()
WITH h
  CREATE (n:FAR_2)
    SET 
      n.request_id = h.request_id,
      n.cvx_maps = apoc.convert.toJson(apoc.map.fromPairs([["03", 6], ["08", 6], ["20", 18], ["21", 12], ["49", 18], ["83", 18], ["114", 2], ["115", 48], ["119", 4], ["133", 4]])), 
      n.pt_list = "AB,BC,MB,NB,NL,NT,NS,NU,ON,PE,QC,SK,YT",
      n.timestamp = apoc.date.currentTimestamp(),
      n.doc = "All PT: Young children missing vaccination schedule"
RETURN n.request_id
reports.title: Query

reports.query:
MATCH (h:FAR_2_HELPER)
WITH h
  MATCH (n:FAS_2 {request_id: h.request_id})
RETURN 
  n.patient_zip AS zip, n.patient_count AS patient_count, n.missing_doses AS missing_doses
  ORDER BY patient_count DESC
reports.title: Young children missing vaccination schedule

reports.query:
MATCH (h:FAR_2_HELPER)
WITH h
  MATCH (n:FAS_2 {request_id: h.request_id})
     WHERE NOT("0123456789" CONTAINS SUBSTRING(n.patient_zip, 0, 1))
RETURN
  n.patient_zip AS zip,
  n.patient_count AS patient_count,
  n.missing_doses AS missing_doses
  ORDER BY patient_count DESC LIMIT 20
reports.title: Top 20 zip code where young children missing vaccination schedule

reports.query:

  SET h.request_id = apoc.create.uuid()
WITH h
  CREATE (n:FAR_3)
    SET
      n.request_id = h.request_id,
      n.cvx_list = "43,52",

RETURN n.request_id

reports.query:
MATCH (h:FAR_3_HELPER)
WITH h
  MATCH (n:FAS_3 {request_id: h.request_id})
RETURN [n.pt, n.patient_zip, n.organization_name] AS path, n.average_distance AS average_distance ORDER BY average_distance DESC LIMIT 100
reports.title: Top 100 zip code with farthest average travel distance to get vaccinated

WITH h

      n.cvx_list = "43,52",

RETURN n.request_id

MATCH (h:FAR_4_HELPER)
WITH h
  MATCH (n:FAS_4 {request_id: h.request_id})
RETURN [n.patient_zip, n.organization_name] AS path, n.vaccination_count ORDER BY path
reports.title: Hep A/B vaccinations at zip code - organization

reports.query:
MATCH (h:FAR_4_HELPER)
WITH h
  MATCH (n:FAS_4 {request_id: h.request_id})
RETURN [n.pt] AS path, COUNT(n.vaccination_count) AS count ORDER BY path
reports.title: Hep A/B vaccinations at PTs

reports.query:
MATCH (h:FAR_5_HELPER)
WITH h
  MATCH (n:FAS_5 {request_id: h.request_id})
WITH n SKIP TOINTEGER(RAND() * 1000) + 1 LIMIT 1000
RETURN
  SUBSTRING(TOSTRING(n.immunization_date), 0, 10) AS date,
  n.immunization_code AS cvx,
  n.immunization_description AS cvx_description,
  SUBSTRING(n.organization_name, 0, 50) AS organization,
  n.encounter_description AS encounter,
  n.encounter_code AS snomet_ct,
  SUBSTRING(n.patient_id, 0, 8) AS patient,
  n.patient_birth_date AS birth_date,
  n.patient_address AS address,
  n.patient_zip AS zip,
  n.patient_gender AS gender,
  n.patient_race AS race
  ORDER BY date
reports.title: Random consecutive 1000 events in the stream of vaccination records

reports.query:
MERGE (h:FAR_5_HELPER)
  SET h.request_id = apoc.create.uuid()
WITH h
  CREATE (n:FAR_5)
    SET
      n.request_id = h.request_id,
      n.pt_list = "AB,BC,MB,NB,NL,NT,NS,NU,ON,PE,QC,SK,YT",
      n.timestamp = apoc.date.currentTimestamp(),
      n.doc = "All PTs: Vaccination record streams."
RETURN n.request_id
reports.title: Query

reports.query:
MATCH (h:FAR_5_HELPER)
WITH h
  MATCH (n:FAS_5 {request_id: h.request_id})
WITH
  n.immunization_code AS code, SUBSTRING(TOSTRING(n.immunization_date), 0, 4) AS year
WITH
  DISTINCT(year) AS year, COLLECT(code) AS codes
RETURN
  year,
  REDUCE(c=0, e IN codes | CASE WHEN e = '03' THEN c + 1 ELSE c END) AS MRR,
  REDUCE(c=0, e IN codes | CASE WHEN e = '08' THEN c + 1 ELSE c END) AS HepB,
  REDUCE(c=0, e IN codes | CASE WHEN e = '21' THEN c + 1 ELSE c END) AS Varicella,
  REDUCE(c=0, e IN codes | CASE WHEN e = '49' THEN c + 1 ELSE c END) AS Hib,
  REDUCE(c=0, e IN codes | CASE WHEN e = '83' THEN c + 1 ELSE c END) AS HepA,
  REDUCE(c=0, e IN codes | CASE WHEN e = '115' THEN c + 1 ELSE c END) AS Tdap,
  REDUCE(c=0, e IN codes | CASE WHEN e = '62' THEN c + 1 ELSE c END) AS HPV_e,
  REDUCE(c=0, e IN codes | CASE WHEN e = '114' THEN c + 1 ELSE c END) AS Meningococcal,
  REDUCE(c=0, e IN codes | CASE WHEN e = '113' THEN c + 1 ELSE c END) AS Td_adult,
  REDUCE(c=0, e IN codes | CASE WHEN e = '43' THEN c + 1 ELSE c END) AS HepB_adult,
  REDUCE(c=0, e IN codes | CASE WHEN e = '52' THEN c + 1 ELSE c END) AS HepA_adult,
  REDUCE(c=0, e IN codes | CASE WHEN e = '10' THEN c + 1 ELSE c END) AS IPV
  ORDER BY year
reports.title: Vaccination records for 12 CVXs

reports.query:
MATCH (h:FAR_5_HELPER)
WITH h
  MATCH (n:FAS_5 {request_id: h.request_id})
WITH
  n.pt AS pt, SUBSTRING(TOSTRING(n.immunization_date), 0, 4) AS year
WITH 
  DISTINCT(year) AS year, COLLECT(pt) AS pts
RETURN
  year,
  REDUCE(c=0, e IN pts | CASE WHEN e = 'AB' THEN c + 1 ELSE c END) AS AB,
  REDUCE(c=0, e IN pts | CASE WHEN e = 'BC' THEN c + 1 ELSE c END) AS BC,
  REDUCE(c=0, e IN pts | CASE WHEN e = 'MB' THEN c + 1 ELSE c END) AS MB,
  REDUCE(c=0, e IN pts | CASE WHEN e = 'NB' THEN c + 1 ELSE c END) AS NB,
  REDUCE(c=0, e IN pts | CASE WHEN e = 'NL' THEN c + 1 ELSE c END) AS NL,
  REDUCE(c=0, e IN pts | CASE WHEN e = 'NS' THEN c + 1 ELSE c END) AS NS,
  REDUCE(c=0, e IN pts | CASE WHEN e = 'NT' THEN c + 1 ELSE c END) AS NT,
  REDUCE(c=0, e IN pts | CASE WHEN e = 'NU' THEN c + 1 ELSE c END) AS NU,
  REDUCE(c=0, e IN pts | CASE WHEN e = 'ON' THEN c + 1 ELSE c END) AS ON,
  REDUCE(c=0, e IN pts | CASE WHEN e = 'QC' THEN c + 1 ELSE c END) AS QC,
  REDUCE(c=0, e IN pts | CASE WHEN e = 'PE' THEN c + 1 ELSE c END) AS PE,
  REDUCE(c=0, e IN pts | CASE WHEN e = 'SK' THEN c + 1 ELSE c END) AS SK,
  REDUCE(c=0, e IN pts | CASE WHEN e = 'YT' THEN c + 1 ELSE c END) AS YT
  ORDER BY year
reports.title: Vaccination records per PT

reports.query:
MATCH (h:FAR_6_HELPER)
WITH h
  MATCH (n:FAS_6 {request_id: h.request_id})
WITH DISTINCT(n.condition_description) AS description, SUM(n.condition_count) AS count ORDER BY count DESC
WITH COLLECT([description, count]) AS description_counts
WITH 
  description_counts[0..10] AS description_counts,
  REDUCE(l=0, e IN description_counts[10..] | CASE WHEN e IS NOT NULL THEN l+e[1] ELSE l END) AS other_count
WITH 
  description_counts + [['Others', other_count]] AS description_counts
  UNWIND description_counts AS description_count
RETURN description_count[0] AS description, description_count[1] AS count
reports.title: Distribution of top 10 conditions (other than medication review due or screening for employment)

reports.query:
MATCH (h:FAR_7_HELPER)
WITH h
  MATCH (n:FAS_7 {request_id: h.request_id})
WITH n.medication_reason_description AS description, SUM(n.medication_reason_count) AS count ORDER BY count DESC
WITH COLLECT([description, count]) AS description_counts
WITH 
  description_counts[0..10] AS description_counts,
  REDUCE(l=0, e IN description_counts[10..] | CASE WHEN e IS NOT NULL THEN l+e[1] ELSE l END) AS other_count
WITH 
  description_counts + [['Others', other_count]] AS description_counts
  UNWIND description_counts AS description_count
RETURN description_count[0] AS description, description_count[1] AS count
reports.title: Distribution of top 10 reasons for medication

reports.query:
MATCH (h:FAR_8_HELPER)
WITH h
  MATCH (n:FAS_8 {request_id: h.request_id})
WITH n.procedure_description AS description, SUM(n.procedure_count) AS count ORDER BY count DESC
WITH COLLECT([description, count]) AS description_counts
WITH 
  description_counts[0..10] AS description_counts,
  REDUCE(l=0, e IN description_counts[10..] | CASE WHEN e IS NOT NULL THEN l+e[1] ELSE l END) AS other_count
WITH 
  description_counts + [['Others', other_count]] AS description_counts
  UNWIND description_counts AS description_count
RETURN description_count[0] AS description, description_count[1] AS count
reports.title: Distribution of top 10 procedures

reports.query:
MATCH (h:FAR_9_HELPER)
WITH h
  MATCH (n:FAS_9 {request_id: h.request_id})
    WHERE NOT("0123456789" CONTAINS SUBSTRING(n.patient_zip, 0, 1))
RETURN
  n.patient_zip AS zip,
  n.patient_count AS patient_count,
  n.missing_doses AS missing_doses,
  n.organization_list AS organization_list
  ORDER BY patient_count DESC LIMIT 30
reports.title: Where would they have been immunized? (Top 30 zip code with most young patients missing vaccination schedule)

reports.query:
MERGE (h:FAR_9_HELPER)
  SET h.request_id = apoc.create.uuid()
WITH h
CREATE (n:FAR_9)
    SET 
      n.request_id = h.request_id,
      n.cvx_maps = apoc.convert.toJson(apoc.map.fromPairs([["03", 6], ["08", 6], ["20", 18], ["21", 12], ["49", 18], ["83", 18], ["114", 2], ["115", 48], ["119", 4], ["133", 4]])), 
      n.pt_list = "AB,BC,MB,NB,NL,NT,NS,NU,ON,PE,QC,SK,YT",
      n.timestamp = apoc.date.currentTimestamp(),
      n.doc = "All PT: Young children missing vaccination schedule"
RETURN n.request_id;
reports.title: Query

reports.query:
WITH ["FAR", "FAS"] AS entity_list
    UNWIND entity_list AS entity
WITH entity, SPLIT("1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9", ",") AS counter_list
    UNWIND counter_list AS counter
WITH entity + "_" + counter AS current_entity,
    "MATCH (n:" + entity + "_" + counter + ") RETURN n" AS batch_producer,
    " WITH n DETACH DELETE n" AS batch_runner
WITH current_entity, batch_producer, batch_runner
    CALL apoc.periodic.iterate(batch_producer, batch_runner, {batchSize:10000, parallel:true})
        YIELD total RETURN current_entity, total;
reports.title: Cleanup
